text: Adriana Caselotti (May 6, 1916 â€“ January 18, 1997) was an American voice actress and a singer. She voiced Snow White in Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs in 1937. Caselotti was born in Bridgeport, Connecticut. She died in Los Angeles, California of respiratory failure from lung cancer. == References == Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:1916 births Category:1997 deaths
